fields.description:
I have created a nexus device from Android Studio 2. The first time I run for this emulator it wants to start the emulator, and then will install/launch the app when emulator is booted.

However, it never detects the boot completed. I always have to compile a second time for it to see the emulator properly.

The logs are here: https://gist.github.com/Topener/31d24cdb3235d1b4c5f96621ab4ed08a
fields.summary: Android: First run for emulator doesn't see emulator started
